data.name: Business Loan Fixed Rate Interest Only
data.description: If you need to borrow money for your business, whether it’s to purchase a property or any other business purpose, with our Business Fixed Rate Fully Drawn Advance you can enjoy the certainty of fixed interest rates and repayments.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible repayment terms available up to a maximum of 30 years if residentially secured, or to a maximum of 20 years if commercial, industrial, cash or mixed security.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Available for business purposes for individual and non-individual borrowers, including sole traders, trusts (excluding SMSFs) and companies.

fees.name: Interest Rate Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is payable for interest rate maintenance/conversion with a Letter of Variation or Letter of Advice.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The cost of each valuation report required to be issued.

fees.name: Limit Excess Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A limit excess fee of $17.50 each time the facility limit is exceeded. If the balance owing exceeds the facility limit with or without our approval, we charge interest on that excess at the default rate.

fees.name: Upfront Fees Residential Security
fees.additionalInfo: For new facilities secured by residential property, this single fee replaces Application Fee, Valuation Fee, Legal and Documentation Fee.

fees.name: Break Cost Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Are payable when a break cost event occurs: (a) we allow you to switch from a fixed interest rate for a facility to a variable interest rate during a fixed interest period or (b) you repay early all or any part of the total amount owing for that facility before the end of a fixed interest period or (c) the total amount owing for that facility becomes repayable because you are in default.

fees.name: Partial Release and Discharge of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever we arrange for a Partial Release or Discharge of Security.

fees.name: Replacement Document Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is payable for replacement of documents due to the original documentation being lost or amendments to the original documents being required.

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Settlement fee is estimated at $300 per settlement.

fees.name: Upfront Legal & Document Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum Fee is $250. The costs for reviewing documents and preparing security documents and facility agreements differ based on the type of security and other factors. The estimated fees will be provided in your Letter of Offer.

fees.name: Registration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when there are additional costs associated with registration (for example, this may include a discharge of mortgage fee, transfer fee or any other dealing fee).

fees.name: Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Also known as establishment fee and payable when you accept the commercial letter of offer. (Does not apply to Residentially Secured Business Loan).

fees.name: Consent and Execution of Leases, Plans of Subdivision etc.
fees.additionalInfo: Consent and Execution of Leases, Plans of Subdivision etc.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Base rate only, an additional margin is applied for security type (cash, residential and commercial) and the applicants credit risk.
Base rate only, an additional margin is applied for security type (cash, residential and commercial) and the applicants credit risk.
